links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..70
mathematica: Join[{0},RecurrenceTable[{a[1]==1,a[2]==1,a[n]==a[n-1]+7^(n-2)a[n-2]}, a[n],{n,20}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 14 2011 *)RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==0, a[1]==1, a[n]==a[n-1]+a[n-2]*7^(n-2)},  a, {n, 25}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [0] cat[n le 2 select 1 else Self(n-1) + Self(n-2)*(7^(n-2)): n in [1..15]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2012
